mapper.select: select *, r.id AS rentId from show_tb as s left join rent_place_reservation_tb as r on s.id = r.show_id where s.organizer_id = #{organizerId} group by s.id order by s.start_date desc
SELECT * FROM ticketing_tb AS t JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id WHERE user_id = ${userId} ORDER BY ticketing_date desc

SELECT * FROM payment_tb AS p JOIN ticketing_tb AS t ON p.ticketing_id = t.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON t.show_id = s.id LEFT JOIN seat_tb AS st ON t.seat_id = st.seat_id LEFT JOIN show_datetime_tb AS sd ON t.show_datetime_id = sd.id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON s.hole_id = h.id JOIN location_tb AS l ON h.location_id = l.id WHERE t.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM show_tb AS s JOIN rent_place_reservation_tb AS r ON s.id = r.show_id JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN location_tb AS l ON h.location_id = l.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
